importantArticles.headline: You’ve probably heard of the VIX Index before—it’s often referred to as the market’s “fear gauge,” a symbolic barometer for uncertainty in the stock market. If you’re a more seasoned investor, you may have tried investing in one of its indirect proxies: the ProShares VIX Short-Term Futures ETF (VIXY). importantArticles.title: Why Fearful Investors Shouldn’t Take the VIXY ETF Bait

This is a lesson he learned from the late Charlie Munger.  There's nothing more discouraging for investors than to lose money on a stock that they thought had plenty of upside and room to grow.
importantArticles.title: This Is the Cardinal Sin Warren Buffett Says Investors Should Avoid
